00046   // Bounding box for all atoms in this group
00047   std::vector<GCoord> AtomicGroup::boundingBox(void) const {
00048     greal min[3] = {0,0,0}, max[3] = {0,0,0};
00049     const_iterator i;
00050     int j;
00051     std::vector<GCoord> res(2);
00052     GCoord c;
00053 
00054     if (atoms.size() == 0) {
00055       res[0] = c;
00056       res[1] = c;
00057       return(res);
00058     }
00059 
00060     for (j=0; j<3; j++)
00061       min[j] = max[j] = (atoms[0]->coords())[j];
00062 
00063     for (i=atoms.begin()+1; i != atoms.end(); i++)
00064       for (j=0; j<3; j++) {
00065         if (max[j] < ((*i)->coords())[j])
00066           max[j] = ((*i)->coords())[j];
00067         if (min[j] > ((*i)->coords())[j])
00068           min[j] = ((*i)->coords())[j];
00069       }
00070 
00071     c.set(min[0], min[1], min[2]);
00072     res[0] = c;
00073     c.set(max[0], max[1], max[2]);
00074     res[1] = c;
00075 
00076     return(res);
00077   }

00079   // Geometric center of the group
00080   GCoord AtomicGroup::centroid(void) const {
00081     GCoord c(0,0,0);
00082     const_iterator i;
00083 
00084     for (i = atoms.begin(); i != atoms.end(); i++)
00085       c += (*i)->coords();
00086 
00087     c /= atoms.size();
00088     return(c);
00089   }
00090 
00091 
00092   GCoord AtomicGroup::centerOfMass(void) const {
00093     GCoord c(0,0,0);
00094     const_iterator i;
00095 
00096     for (i=atoms.begin(); i != atoms.end(); i++) {
00097       c += (*i)->mass() * (*i)->coords();
00098     }
00099     c /= totalMass();
00100     return(c);
00101   }
00102 
00103   //* Note: this code implicitly assumes the group is neutral,
00104   //  since it sums based on atomic number
00105   GCoord AtomicGroup::centerOfElectrons(void) const {
00106     GCoord c(0,0,0);
00107     const_iterator i;
00108     int electrons = 0;
00109 
00110     for (i=atoms.begin(); i != atoms.end(); i++) {
00111       int an = (*i)->atomic_number();  
00112       c += an * (*i)->coords();
00113       electrons += an;
00114     }
00115     c /= electrons;
00116     return(c);
00117   }
00118 
00119   GCoord AtomicGroup::dipoleMoment(void) const {
00120     GCoord center = centroid();
00121     GCoord moment(0,0,0);
00122     const_iterator i;
00123     for (i=atoms.begin(); i != atoms.end(); i++) {
00124       moment += (*i)->charge() * ((*i)->coords() - center);
00125     }
00126     return(moment);
00127   }
00128 
00129   greal AtomicGroup::totalCharge(void) const {
00130     const_iterator i;
00131     greal charge = 0.0;
00132 
00133     for (i = atoms.begin(); i != atoms.end(); i++)
00134       charge += (*i)->charge();
00135 
00136     return(charge);
00137   }
00138 
00139   greal AtomicGroup::totalMass(void) const {
00140     const_iterator i;
00141     greal mass = 0.0;
00142 
00143     for (i = atoms.begin(); i != atoms.end(); i++)
00144       mass += (*i)->mass();
00145 
00146     return(mass);
00147   }

00149   // Geometric max radius of the group (relative to the centroid)
00150   greal AtomicGroup::radius(void) const {
00151     GCoord c = centroid();
00152     greal radius = 0.0;
00153     const_iterator i;
00154 
00155     for (i=atoms.begin(); i != atoms.end(); i++) {
00156       greal d = c.distance2((*i)->coords());
00157       if (d > radius)
00158         radius = d;
00159     }
00160 
00161     radius = sqrt(radius);
00162     return(radius);
00163   }
00164 
00165 
00166 
00167   greal AtomicGroup::radiusOfGyration(void) const {
00168     GCoord c = centerOfMass();
00169     greal radius = 0;
00170     const_iterator i;
00171 
00172     for (i = atoms.begin(); i != atoms.end(); i++)
00173       radius += c.distance2((*i)->coords());
00174 
00175     radius = sqrt(radius / atoms.size());
00176     return(radius);
00177   }

00179 
00180   greal AtomicGroup::rmsd(const AtomicGroup& v) {
00181   
00182     if (size() != v.size())
00183       throw(std::runtime_error("Cannot compute RMSD between groups with different sizes"));
00184 
00185 
00186     int n = size();
00187     double d = 0.0;
00188     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00189       GCoord x = atoms[i]->coords();
00190       GCoord y = v.atoms[i]->coords();
00191       d += x.distance2(y);
00192     }
00193   
00194     d = sqrt(d/n);
00195 
00196     return(d);
00197   }

00201   std::vector<GCoord> AtomicGroup::getTransformedCoords(const XForm& M) const {
00202     std::vector<GCoord> crds(atoms.size());
00203     const_iterator i;
00204     GMatrix W = M.current();
00205     int j = 0;
00206 
00207     for (i = atoms.begin(); i != atoms.end(); i++) {
00208       GCoord res = W * (*i)->coords();
00209       crds[j++] = res;
00210     }
00211 
00212     return(crds);
00213   }

00216   void AtomicGroup::translate(const GCoord & v) {
00217       iterator i;
00218       for (i = atoms.begin(); i != atoms.end(); i++)
00219           (*i)->coords() += v;
00220   }
00221 
00222   void AtomicGroup::applyTransform(const XForm& M) {
00223     iterator i;
00224     GMatrix W = M.current();
00225 
00226     for (i = atoms.begin(); i != atoms.end(); i++)
00227       (*i)->coords() = W * (*i)->coords();
00228 
00229   }

00232   // Returns a newly allocated array of double coords in row-major
00233   // order...
00234   double* AtomicGroup::coordsAsArray(void) const {
00235     double *A;
00236     int n = size();
00237 
00238     A = new double[n*3];
00239     int k = 0;
00240     int i;
00241     for (i=0; i<n; i++) {
00242       A[k++] = atoms[i]->coords().x();
00243       A[k++] = atoms[i]->coords().y();
00244       A[k++] = atoms[i]->coords().z();
00245     }
00246 
00247     return(A);
00248   }
00249 
00250   // Returns a newly allocated array of double coords in row-major order
00251   // transformed by the current transformation.
00252   double* AtomicGroup::transformedCoordsAsArray(const XForm& M) const {
00253     double *A;
00254     GCoord x;
00255     int n = size();
00256     GMatrix W = M.current();
00257 
00258     A = new double[n*3];
00259     int k = 0;
00260     int i;
00261     for (i=0; i<n; i++) {
00262       x = W * atoms[i]->coords();
00263       A[k++] = x.x();
00264       A[k++] = x.y();
00265       A[k++] = x.z();
00266     }
00267 
00268     return(A);
00269   }

00273   GCoord AtomicGroup::centerAtOrigin(void) {
00274     GCoord c = centroid();
00275     iterator i;
00276 
00277     for (i = atoms.begin(); i != atoms.end(); i++)
00278       (*i)->coords() -= c;
00279 
00280     return(c);
00281   }

00284 
00285   void AtomicGroup::perturbCoords(const greal rms) {
00286     int i, n = size();
00287     GCoord r;
00288 
00289     loos::base_generator_type& rng = loos::rng_singleton();
00290     boost::uniform_real<> uni;
00291     boost::variate_generator<loos::base_generator_type&, boost::uniform_real<> > func(rng, uni);
00292 
00293     for (i=0; i<n; i++) {
00294       r.x(func());
00295       r.y(func());
00296       r.z(func());
00297 
00298       r /= r.length();
00299       r *= rms;
00300 
00301       atoms[i]->coords() += r;
00302     }
00303   }
